title: 'The Masked Singer' recap: Jenny McCarthy was 'so close' to correctly guessing Eagle
text:
CLOSE The Panda was revealed during "The Masked Singer" and Robin Thicke jokingly guessed the unmasked star right. USA TODAY

Spoiler alert! This story contains details from "The Masked Singer" Season 2, Episode 3, including the identity of the eliminated celebrity.

The masked madness continues.

"Masked Singer" returned Wednesday with four new celebrity contestants – Flower, Penguin, Fox and Eagle – all looking to stay in the competition.

Here's what happened:

Flower versus Eagle

First up was Flower. She showcased her serious singing chops on a soulful rendition of Dolly Parton’s "9 to 5” that left the judges saying, "We are not worthy." Jenny McCarthy added, "I’m so speechless." She guessed Taraji P. Henson because the singer said she had an "empire," but the other judges disagreed. "No way, I don’t think it’s an actress," Nicole Scherzinger said. She picked Patti LaBelle, while Robin Thicke guessed Jennifer Hudson because "there’s only a few people in the world … who can hit those notes."

Last week on 'The Masked Singer': Robin Thicke (jokingly) guessed this unmasked star right!

Flower added that she's "dipped my petals in just about everything" from cooking to crafts and clothing.

Next up was Eagle. His comedic rendition of Meat Loaf’s "I'd Do Anything for Love" didn’t give the judge’s any more clarity on his identity. So McCarthy turned to his appearance, saying, "You have the legs of Howard Stern." Scherzinger believed it could be Bret Michaels because of his red bandanna. Thicke guessed Pauly Shore because Eagle said he lost a parent, like Shore, whose mother died in April 2018.

Eagle's hint? "I have soared to great heights as the face of my field, but now after a serious health scare … I've realized that life is too short to let my dreams fly by."

The audience and the judges elected Flower's performance as their favorite, sending Eagle to the brink of elimination.

Penguin versus Fox

Penguin strutted her stuff during Zedd, Maren Morris and Grey’s “The Middle.” Scherzinger said, "You were out of your comfort zone but looked like you had a lot of fun out there." She guessed Megan Mullally because of a sign that said "I’m not your secretary." Thicke said she danced like McCarthy's cousin, Melissa McCarthy. However, McCarthy picked Kathy Griffin because Penguin said her career ended abruptly.

Penguin's hint? "Everything is not as black and white as it seems." Ken Jeong responded, "Maybe someone who is color blind."

Last up was Fox, who displayed his dance moves and vocals on Maroon 5’s “This Love." Thicke said, "He moved like a professional performer." McCarthy believed it’s a Broadway star, like Leslie Odom Jr. Scherzinger thought his "onscreen superhero" clue could mean Anthony Mackie. Jeong picked Tyrese Gibson and then switched to Jamie Foxx, again.

The masked singer's hint? He does his "best work at night."

Fox's genuine talent and stage presence beat out Penguin's upbeat attitude, leading to a smackdown between Eagle and Penguin. Only one would stay.

Eagle did a playful rendition of "These Boots Are Made for Walkin'" by Nancy Sinatra, while Penguin busted out the dance moves on Fifth Harmony’s "Worth It." Penguin's moves paid off because she won the battle, leaving Eagle as the fourth contestant to be unmasked.

"It was like a weird episode of 'Angry Bird,'" McCarthy quipped.

She added, "This was a tough one for us." McCarthy's final guess was Adam Carolla. Thicke picked Stern. Jeong guessed Craig Ferguson. Nicole selected Jeff Foxworthy.

They were all wrong. It was Dr. Drew Pinsky, the host of "Celebrity Rehab With Dr. Drew" and "Loveline." He described his time on the show as "very bizarre."

Thicke exclaimed, "I didn’t see that coming at all. McCathy said she was "so close" to a correct guess by choosing Carolla, Pinsky's "Loveline" co-host.

Pinsky joins unmasked singers boxing champion Laila Ali (Panda), Olympic figure skater Johnny Weir (Egg) and gaming YouTuber Tyler "Ninja" Blevins (Ice Cream). Four celebs down, 12 to go.

description: Eagle's hint? "I have soared to great heights as the face of my field, but now after a serious health scare … I've realized that life is too short."
